review: I LOVE it! We recently signed up with a satellite television provider that we're not at all happy with. The selection of movies leaves a lot to be desired unless we want to pay for almost every one of them. I bought the Fire TV Stick at my local Staples store, took it home, set it up in less than ten minutes and it works GREAT! TV shows, movies, videos; it's all there. What surprised me is how easy it is to move the device from one television to another. Just unplug, take it for a stroll, and plug it into any other TV, just as easily as plugging in any USB device. Once it's on your wireless system, it's there. VERY simple to set up, great selection of shows, works anywhere there's a wifi connection (including my RV), and a huge selection is available with no addition charge other than your Amazon Prime membership. One of the best features is the ability to search for exactly what you want to watch; if you want to see an available list of John Wayne movies, select "John Wayne". If you want a specific genre, just select it. You can also select just the free Amazon Prime listings, recent movies, kids shows, and so on. There's just nothing bad about this little device!  If you have an Amazon Prime membership, either buy the Fire TV Stick online at Amazon and it automatically is registered, or buy it at a box store and register it yourself. Easy either way, and the price is the same. I like simple, and I like things that work like they're supposed to. This is both.
author: Eva M. Thompson
